p: For fabrication of triaxial CNT-Chit-PEDOT fibers, directly drawn nanotubes from a spinnable synthesized MWNT forest were wrapped around the surface of the as-prepared coaxial Chit-PEDOT fibers layer by layer (see Figure 1b), as previously reported [ 57]. After wrapping, drops of ethanol were applied to condense the MWNT layer and promote the interaction between the CNT and the fiber layers.
